name: Battle Ball (itch)
description:
THE GAME:

Battle Ball is a local multiplayer Tank Battle Soccer Game. Think of it as a mix between Wii Tanks and Rocket League. I hope that you enjoy this small project and feel free to leave any feedback in the comments below!

  • CONTROLS:
    • Player 1 (Blue)
      • WASD to move
      • Space to shoot
    • Player 2 (Red)
      • Arrow Keys to move
      • Numpad Enter to shoot
  • POWER-UPS
    • Heavy Cannon (Skull Icon)
    • Rapid Fire Cannon (Two-Bullet Icon)
    • Mortar (Large Shell Icon)
    • Atom Smasher (Atom Icon)
    • Laser Cannon (Lightning Bolt Icon
  • SCORES
    • Goal: 5 Points
    • Kill: 1 Point

THE PROJECT:

I currently have no further plans to expand on this prototype, as this was simply an opportunity for me to learn Unity's new input system while also setting out to make a small game in about two weeks.

I'm quite happy with the end result, though I know it's far from perfect. Some personal things I know I'd like to improve are the main menu, icons for the weapon power-ups, and I tried really hard but was unable to implement a reliable four player experience.

Overall, this was a fun project, and I look forward to improving from here. Please, feel free to leave any comments, suggestions, and/or criticisms below. Your feedback will help to make my future projects that much better.
